nodes.text: Suljo Warde was a Human male Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. Among his greatest contributions to the Order, Warde left behind a holocron in which he had stored all his knowledge, including information on his unique form of precognition, which allowed him to see others' future choices.

He was born on the planet Chandrila and active on Arbooine, installing his student, Gel Marcolf, as the Reeve of Quolas there. After falling to the dark side of the Force on Cato Neimoidia, Warde entered a self-imposed exile on the Sith tombworld, Moraband. Leaving behind fragments of his holocron for others to find in the future, Warde had seen a vision that he would die amid the tombs of the Sith world.
